name: etherworld
description: EtherWorld is a virtual reality multi-user content creation tool. Create a room today, and build content with your friends.
author: MozVR <mozvr@mozilla.com>

scripts.start: export NODE_ENVIRONMENT='production' && npm run mkdir:db && npm run build && node src/server/server
scripts.dev: export NODE_ENVIRONMENT='development' && npm run mkdir:db && npm run build && nodemon src/server/server --watch src/shared/  --watch src/server/ --watch src/client/index.html & npm run watch
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:css: npm run mkdir:css && autoprefixer --browsers 'last 10 versions' --map --no-cascade src/client/css/app.css -o build/css/app.css
scripts.build:js: if [[ $NODE_ENVIRONMENT == 'production' ]]; then echo export SOURCE_MAPS=0; else export SOURCE_MAPS=1; fi ; echo $SOURCE_MAPS && npm run mkdir:js && browserify src/client/js/app.js --debug=$SOURCE_MAPS -t [ babelify --only src/client/js/ ] -o build/js/app.js
scripts.watch: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js
